name: 10 Maxims for Guiding Shy, Reluctant & Unruly AI
name_original: 10 Maxims for Guiding Shy, Reluctant & Unruly AI
description:
Ten Maxims for Guiding Shy, Reluctant or Unruly Artificial Intelligence.

An experiment in AI collaboration between WriteWithLaika and MidJourney Image Generator, feeding Laika auto-generated text to Midjourney. 

Built in Twine's Chapbook Storyformat.

Grazie mille to Char Putney and Martin Pilchmair, for inspiration!

https://alphachar.com/ & http://vertical-progress.net/
